fullText: The production, starring Corey Hawkins and Yahya Abdul-Mateen II as the brothers Lincoln and Booth, crackles with the same electric tension that made Parks's play a Pulitzer Prize winner in 2002.
dtliExcerpt: The production, starring Corey Hawkins and Yahya Abdul-Mateen II as the brothers Lincoln and Booth, crackles with the same electric tension that made Parks's play a Pulitzer Prize winner in 2002.
bwwExcerpt: Make no mistake: After an evening on Broadway with Corey Hawkins, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II and the electrifying theatrical crossfire of "Topdog/Underdog," you'll never again think of three-card monte as a mere money-grubbing street hustle....
showScoreExcerpt: The production, starring Corey Hawkins and Yahya Abdul-Mateen II as the brothers Lincoln and Booth, crackles with the same electric tension that made Parks's play a Pulitzer Prize winner in 2002.
